Linux VPS

On Flexeere's all-SSD Cloud servers, you can run any application!
Cloud servers that launch in 30 seconds or less. The most cost-effective approach to publishing your web applications quickly and effectively.

Get started

Advanced Plans and Add-Ons

Upgrade your plan for advanced features or enhance your account with optional add-ons

Multi-Server Management

Need more than one account? Add shared, VPS, or even dedicated services to your account with ease.

Access Control

Create unique passwords restricting access to different areas of your account. Generate one for billing information.

Content Delivery Network

CloudFlare is built directly into your account. An advanced content delivery network.

Advanced Capabilities

Use advanced capabilities like Secure Shell (SSH) access, server-side includes, log file access.

Unique IPs

Enable advanced control of ports and further protect your account by securing an IP address.

Domain Privacy

Prevent identity theft, spam and phishing attacks by masking the personal information.

SiteLock

Defend your websites against attacks and malware by detecting and fixing vulnerabilities.

CodeGuard

CodeGuard works behind the scenes, taking daily backups and saving each as a separate version.

Spam Protection

Powered by Google, Postini filters out harmful and unwanted content before it reaches your inbox.

Enterprise-Class Service

Optimized for the most popular applications!

24/7 Expert Support

Get your own IT department, instantly. Our award-winning US-Based experts are available to help.

Unlimited Hosting

Powerful VPS hosting that doesn't put limits on the amount of data you transfer.

FREE Domain

We include a domain with every annual "Unlimited" plan and, unlike most hosts, we don't charge a fees.

Free SSL Security

We include Let's Encrypt SSL certificates on all domains so the data passed is always safely.

Unlimited Email

Create unlimited addresses with POP/IMAP/SMTP accounts. Plus support for autoresponders, and webmail.

Fast SSD Storage

All of your files are stored on fast, high-performance solid-state drives.

FAQs About Phox Cloud Hosting

FAQs

What is Linux VPS Hosting?

Linux VPS Server Hosting is the most common and affordable form of website hosting. Multiple users will share the resources.

What is the architecture of Linux VPS Hosting?

Affordability is the #1 benefit of Linux VPS Hosting. However most Shared Hosting platforms are also managed.

How many websites can I host with a Linux VPS Hosting?

Linux VPS Hosting is the platform in which WordPress can be utilized. There are some platforms that can be optimized.

What if I need assistance?

In unmetered Linux VPS you are sharing the resources of a server with multiple users.
